question: Which international block has declared itself as “LGBTIQ Freedom Zone”?
explanation:
Recently, a resolution has been adopted by the European Union’s Parliament that declares the 27-member bloc as “LGBTIQ Freedom Zone”. The resolution was passed with a majority vote of 492 favoring the motion and 141 against the motion.
Most of the countries in the EU except a few like Poland recognizes same sex union and have made legal provisions for same sex marriage.
